query:
WITH cte as (
            SELECT attempt >= $2 as should_fail
            FROM task_instance
            WHERE task_instance_id = $1
        )
        UPDATE task_instance
        SET status = CASE WHEN (select should_fail from cte) THEN 'failed'::task_status ELSE 'pending'::task_status END,
            last_error_details = $3
        WHERE task_instance_id = $1
